name: Shadow Run (itch)
description:
Shadow Run Is a 3D platformer, where you the player most dodge and maneuver to the end of the level whilst escaping the cosmic shadows. They have multiplied out of control and follow your every move!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

The player can wall jump!

The goal is to reach the button at the end of the stage. Whilst dodging the shadow clones and maneuvering through the terrain
